tag_list: online-marketer, digital-marketing, social-media, online-marketing, twitter, content-marketing, blogger
overview:
Lauren Proctor is a New York City based marketing innovation strategist and freelance writer who helps companies increase revenues and exposure through Internet marketing.

She consults with a select roster of brands in advancing their interactive new media marketing strategy, and was inspired to start her company, Proctor + Hall, while she was working with L2 Think Tank, Halogen Media Group, Sales Graphics, and The Hybrid Reality Institute.

Lauren’s approach to marketing takes into account brand strategy, consumer behavior, transmedia storytelling, behavioral psychology, and digital culture. She received an MA in Marketing Innovation Strategy from New York University and received BA’s in English and Journalism after studying at both the University of Oxford and the University of Massachusetts at Amherst.
